/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template-haji.title: hajimari helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template-haji.name: hajimari
/hr/ghcr.io-bjw-s-helm-app-template-haji.doc: Hajimari is a versatile and customizable browser startpage designed specifically for Kubernetes users. It provides a beautiful and user-friendly interface that makes it easy to discover and launch applications running in your home lab. With Hajimari, you can quickly access all of your favorite applications and services, including those deployed on your cluster, without having to remember complex URLs or navigate through multiple tabs.
